analysis: The project currently lacks a black hole theme and animated elements. The HTML file needs to be updated to include black hole-related content, and the CSS file should incorporate animations and a dark, cosmic theme. The JavaScript file should handle animations and interactive elements related to black holes.

improvements.description: Add black hole-related content, including sections on event horizons, singularities, and accretion disks, with interactive elements to explore these concepts.
Implement a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, including swirling effects and glowing elements to simulate the mysterious nature of black holes.
Add JavaScript functionality to animate black hole visuals, including interactive sliders to explore different aspects of black holes, such as mass and spin, and smooth transitions between sections.
